about_the_game:
"What do you do... when your time is up..."

Summary


Legends of Koyannis is a First person Horror experience built with the Unreal Engine for beautiful visuals and lighting effects.

You will have to survive as you explore the environment looking for items that will give you information for you to piece the mystery together and escape from the mysterious beings that are hunting you. You have a limited battery life so be careful!

Play as Jintan Loire, an explorer who is looking into a legend that has spread around the world about a strange and mysterious man in armour.

After falling into a cave while looking for clues of a recent disappearance, armed only with a flashlight and notepad, explore the dark cave, look for an exit and find clues to the missing person.

But beware... someone or something is following you.

Are you able to solve the armour of Parity's legend?

Early Access

This Steam Early Access game is currently not a finished game and may or may not change significantly over the course of development. To learn more about Steam Early Access, please visit
This will allow for you, the community, to help us develop this into a truly special game and a series for you all to enjoy!

Features that will become available over the course of the early access are:
- Multiple new levels, with different styles of terrains, including inside the player characters own mind!
- Improved AI as we fix them up.
- Access to features as they are being developed - allowing you to explore the world and test out new features!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence as well as small portions of blood.

short_description: Have you now heard it? You're not alone… you never were. That pile of flesh? That’s not the only thing following you… A great evil lies within these caves. Oh… Oh no… you poor poor soul… What will you do… when the time… is… up…?
